description: Get a response to a user's input.

parameters.name: version_date
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: An input object that includes the input text.

parameters.name: alternate_intents
parameters.description: Whether to return more than one intent. Set to `true` to return all matching intents.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: State information for the conversation. Continue a conversation by including the context object from the previous response.

parameters.name: entities
parameters.description: Include the entities from the previous response when they do not need to change and to prevent Watson from trying to identify them.

parameters.name: intents
parameters.description: An array of name-confidence pairs for the user input. Include the intents from the previous response when they do not need to change and to prevent Watson from trying to identify them.

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: System output. Include the output from the request when you have several requests within the same Dialog turn to pass back in the intermediate information.
